name: Sibhatullah Sangeen
story: Kabir Nazari grew up in a small village in Iran. Growing up, he always idolized his older brother who was a member of the Iranian Revolutionary Guard. When his brother was killed in action, Kabir vowed to follow in his footsteps and joined the military as soon as he turned 18. After serving for a few years, he was selected for specialized training as a recon marksman. He now serves as a corporal in the Iranian military's special forces unit.
